name: Tool Results Conversation Evaluation
description: Evaluation suite for conversations containing tool outputs, data analysis, and system interactions

queries.query: What was the structure of the API response from the user authentication endpoint?
queries.expectedSummary: Authentication API response structure and status code meanings

queries.query: Show me the results of the user analytics query we ran yesterday
queries.expectedSummary: User analytics query results showing key metrics and trends

queries.query: What were the performance benchmarks for the new algorithm implementation?
queries.expectedSummary: Performance benchmark results comparing old and new algorithm implementations

queries.query: What errors appeared in the application logs during the deployment?
queries.expectedSummary: Deployment error analysis from application logs and stack traces

queries.query: What was the outcome of the integration test suite run?
queries.expectedSummary: Integration test suite results including coverage and failed test analysis

queries.query: How has CPU and memory usage changed after the optimization?
queries.expectedSummary: System resource utilization changes following performance optimization

queries.query: What was the status of the customer data migration process?
queries.expectedSummary: Customer data migration status with validation results and any issues

queries.query: What vulnerabilities were found in the latest security scan?
queries.expectedSummary: Security vulnerability scan results with risk assessment and recommendations

queries.query: Why did the CI/CD pipeline fail on the last deployment attempt?
queries.expectedSummary: CI/CD pipeline failure analysis with build logs and error diagnostics

queries.query: What themes emerged from the latest customer feedback survey?
queries.expectedSummary: Customer feedback survey analysis with sentiment and key themes
